tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: The doctor understood the problem well and has done correct diagnosis. He didn't rush into any tests or medication.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr sudhkar were friendly & explained  everything  about knee surgery.After 2 months of surgery  I  have consul ted & he was kind enough  to explain  my queries.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had to visit the doctor once for my fathers ankle sprain on June 6th and twice for my own ligament tear on June 26th and a follow up check today for the right ankle. What I had observed is Dr. Sudhakar analyses the injury keenly and prescribes the medicines (tablets or ointment) or other suggestions accordingly based on the need. He doesn't rush the patients for scans or X-ray unnecessarily and understands the pain of the patient exactly and tries to cure it. I would definitely suggest him for any sports injuries or orthopedic problems.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I was suffering from TFCC pain in the wrist and consulted Dr. G K Sudhakar Reddy and he suggested a forearm cast. All was well till here ***** * ***** ******* ********** **** ***** ***** ** **** *** *** *** First of all the doctor did not supervise the cast placement and the assistants placed the cast above my knuckle. After the cast was removed, since it had been directly pressing the knuckle joint, it caused a lot of damage to my hand. Earlier I had pain in just one site, after removing cast I have pain at multiple sites, making my life miserable.  * **** *** ********** *** *** *** **** *** *** ***** ********* ** *** **** ********** ***** ** * **** ******** ********** I don’t know when will I be ever pain free.

review:
Dr. Sudhakar Reddy was kind and capable of comprehending the patient's condition and recommending the best remedy. I would recommend this doctor to anyone who has a problem with their joints.
Doctors can be available in Gachibowli, Serilingampally, and Kondapur. The staff will answer in a courteous manner.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
He calmly assured me and did not order for x-rays or mri or tests. 
He suggested a conservative treatment which includes physiotherapy, ointment, diet etc 

He patiently answered all my questions and was not in a hurry to see another patient.

He has a smiling disposition and very friendly

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: my father in law consulted him reg. his backache.  Dr Reddy patiently listened to his problem and didn't recommend x-ray immediately instead told him to take just 2 medicines for a week and see if the pain subsides with it before going staight for xray considering the current covid situation and his age .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was suffering from sever heel/foot pain. I had visited doctor Sudhakar reddy in past as well and my experience was always good. He gives time to the patients and most importantly, he is always on time. He never prescribe unnecessary medication and always advice to do some exercise. Thank you Sir.

we consulted dr Sudhakar for my wife,73 years age,who fell down accidentally. He examined her thoroughly and explained the problem to her .He also waited for us to see her X ray report before we left.
Highly impressed with his  skill patience and communication.
I am fully satisfied with his treatment and thank him for treatment provided.
